remarks: Well-Founded Induction Schema.  If a property passes from all elements less than ` y ` of a well-founded class ` A ` to ` y ` itself (induction hypothesis), then the property holds for all elements of ` A ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Feb-2011.)
statement:
wfisg.1 $e |- ( y e. A -> ( A. z e. Pred ( R , A , y ) [. z / y ]. ph -> ph ) ) $.
wfisg $p |- ( ( R We A /\ R Se A ) -> A. y e. A ph ) $.
$d A y $.
$d A y z $.
$d R y $.
$d R y z $.
$d ph z $.
